pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / Ryzen 3 or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1070 or RTX2060 or similar
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Debian 10, Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Core i3 / Ryzen 3 or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1070 or RTX2060 or similar
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
